game.name: iRacing
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: We are the world’s premier motorsports racing game. An iRacing membership provides entry into the newest form of motorsport: internet racing. Internet racing is a fun, easy, and inexpensive way for race fan and gamers alike to enjoy the thrill of the racetrack from the comfort of their home.
game.shortDescriptionEn: We are the world’s premier motorsports racing game. An iRacing membership provides entry into the newest form of motorsport: internet racing. Internet racing is a fun, easy, and inexpensive way for race fan and gamers alike to enjoy the thrill of the racetrack from the comfort of their home.

reviewHighlights.text: 스팀 말고 그냥 공홈에서 결제 하시는게 나중에 머리 아플 일 없으니 그냥 공홈 결제 오랜 만에 다시 접했더만 연동도 안되네
온라인 심레이싱 게임중 최고 단 지갑 털어감
